title.rendered: Social Media Marketing Made Easy With JARVEE – The Complete Guide

content.rendered:
Hi everyone,

Over the last few weeks, we wrote a series of JARVEE tutorials for you. They cover a lot of topics on how to set everything up, from the most basic features to some of the most advanced ones.

This is what you will learn if you walk through these step-by-step tutorials:

  • how to create JARVEE marketing campaigns that will automatically post your blog’s content at optimized times to keep your fans engaged and your accounts and pages active
  • how to use JARVEE tools like: Auto-Follow, Unfollow, Like, Comment, Group Finder and Joiner, Auto-Retweet, Auto-RePin, and so on, to grow your accounts faster than ever
  • how to make use of the power of Facebook and LinkedIn Groups or Google+ Communities to grow your fanbase and find potential customers
  • how to cross-promote and use all the important social platforms to their maximum advantage: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Google Plus, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Tumblr and Youtube
  • how to monitor your results and find out areas for improvement

To get the most out of your social media marketing with JARVEE start with our first tutorial that shows you how to schedule an entire month’s worth of content in just 10 minutes for your Facebook Marketing:

  • Schedule All Your Facebook Marketing in 10 Minutes or Less

Continue with some more advanced techniques to help you get more social traffic and grow your Facebook followers count by using JARVEE extra modules and the power of targeted Facebook Groups:

  • 5 Ways To Maximize Your Facebook Traffic With JARVEE

If you’re looking to grow a Twitter presence, this next tutorial is for you. Have a consistent Twitter activity with JARVEE campaigns and speed up the growth of your accounts with tools like Retweet, Follow, Unfollow, Like, and Mention:

  • Grow your Twitter Accounts 10 Times Faster With JARVEE
  • How To Easily Schedule Your Tweets Using Twitter and JARVEE

Instagram is no longer a challenge with JARVEE. You can schedule your visual content with advanced features like a Monitoring Folder (JARVEE will automatically post the photos from your chosen folder at regular intervals), add more content with the Repost module and attract new users with Auto-Follow, Like, and Comment:

  • Save Hours By Scheduling Your Instagram Content With JARVEE
  • Complete Instagram Hashtag Research for Any Niche With JARVEE
  • How To Grow Your Instagram Accounts Like a Pro With JARVEE

Learn how easy it is to create a JARVEE campaign for multiple social networks and how to make the best of LinkedIn, Pinterest and Google Plus marketing:

  • Cross-Promoting On Social Media With JARVEE

With these tutorials you can get started in no time with both JARVEE and Social Media Marketing. Soon enough you will have a continuously growing audience and more business opportunities.

We’re always trying to come up with the best resources to help you succeed with social media marketing. That’s why, if there is something else that you want to learn about, just let us know in the comments, and we will add more tutorials in the future.
